5 Weeks Before Last Frost: Week of March 29
  Start seedlings in flats
    lettuce: 5 seeds broadcast
3 Weeks Before Last Frost: Week of April 12
  Prick out seedlings into flats
    lettuce: 4+ seedlings at 1.5 in. spacing in 3 in. deep flats
1 Week Before Last Frost: Week of April 26
  Harden off
    lettuce: 4 seedlings
Last Frost: Week of May 3
  Transplant
    lettuce: 4 seedlings
